thread.title: ICC Sydney CEO re-elected as AIPC President
thread.title_full: ICC Sydney CEO re-elected as AIPC President

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: ICC Sydney CEO re-elected as AIPC President
text:
ICC Sydney CEO re-elected as AIPC President ICC Sydney CEO re-elected as AIPC President Details Category: Appointments Created on Thursday, 16 July 2015 09:15 Geoff Donaghy, Chief Executive Officer of International Convention Centre Sydney (ICC Sydney), has been re-elected as the International Association of Convention Centres (AIPC) President for a second term. The announcement was made at the AIPC Annual Conference in Boston, July 2015. 
AIPC is the industry association for professional convention and exhibition centre managers world-wide. AIPC represents a global network of more than 175 leading centres in 58 countries with the active involvement of over 900 management-level professionals. Geoff Donaghy was the first President of the international association to be appointed from the Asia Pacific region. Speaking of his re-election, he said: “AIPC is committed to encouraging and recognising excellence in convention centre management, while at the same time providing the tools to achieve such high standards through its research, educational and networking programs. It is a great honour to be recognised and trusted by my global peers to continue working in such a unique position amongst the various organisations that represent the meetings industry.” Related articles
